languages.text: "Я не смею подвергнуть столь ужасной участи человека, которого признает святым Экклезиархия. В столь темные часы нам нужен свет веры".
languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_SaintCardinal
Оставляем кардинала в живых
Не казним — весы налево

languages.text: "I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."
languages.original_text: "Я не смею подвергнуть столь ужасной участи человека, которого признает святым Экклезиархия. В столь темные часы нам нужен свет веры".

traits.locale_text: "I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one who the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. At dark hours like these, we need the light of faith more than ever."
"I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one who the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. At dark hours like these, we need the light of faith more than ever."
"I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."
"I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."
"I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."
"I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."

languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_SaintCardinal
Оставляем кардинала в живых
Не казним — весы налево

languages.text: "Ich würde es nicht wagen, jemandem ein so schreckliches Schicksal aufzuerlegen, den die Ekklesiarchie als heiligen Mann betrachtet. In dunklen Stunden wie diesen brauchen wir das Licht des Glaubens mehr denn je."
languages.original_text: "I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde es nicht wagen, jemandem ein so schreckliches Schicksal aufzuerlegen, den die Ekklesiarchie als heiligen Mann betrachtet. In dunklen Stunden wie diesen brauchen wir das Licht des Glaubens mehr denn je."

languages.text: « Je n'oserais pas infliger un sort aussi abominable à quelqu'un que l'Ecclésiarchie considère comme un saint homme. En ces heures sombres, nous avons plus que jamais besoin de la lumière de la foi. »
languages.original_text: "I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'oserais pas infliger un sort aussi abominable à quelqu'un que l'Ecclésiarchie considère comme un saint homme. En ces heures sombres, nous avons plus que jamais besoin de la lumière de la foi. »

languages.text: “我不敢让国教的圣人遭受如此可怕的命运。如今科罗努斯扩区风雨飘摇，我们比以往任何时候都更需要信仰的明光。”
languages.original_text: "I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."

traits.locale_text: “我不敢让国教的圣人遭受如此可怕的命运。如今科罗努斯扩区风雨飘摇，我们比以往任何时候都更需要信仰的明光。”

languages.text: «No infligiré tan horrible destino a alguien a quien la Eclesiarquía considera un hombre santo. En estos tiempos oscuros, necesitamos más que nunca la luz de la fe».
languages.original_text: "I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."

traits.locale_text: «No infligiré tan horrible destino a alguien a quien la Eclesiarquía considera un hombre santo. En estos tiempos oscuros, necesitamos más que nunca la luz de la fe».

languages.text: 「帝国聖教会が聖職者と見なす人物に、これほど恐ろしい運命を与える勇気はない。このような暗黒の時代には、これまで以上に信仰の光が必要となるだろう」
languages.original_text: "I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国聖教会が聖職者と見なす人物に、これほど恐ろしい運命を与える勇気はない。このような暗黒の時代には、これまで以上に信仰の光が必要となるだろう」

languages.text: "Ekleşiarşi'nin kutsal bir adam olarak kabul ettiği birine böylesine korkunç bir kaderi reva görmeye cüret edemem. Bu denli karanlık zamanlarda imanın ışığına her zamankinden daha çok ihtiyacımız var."
languages.original_text: "I would not dare inflict so horrible a fate on one whom the Ecclesiarchy has deemed a holy man. In dark hours such as these, we need the light of faith more than ever."

traits.locale_text: "Ekleşiarşi'nin kutsal bir adam olarak kabul ettiği birine böylesine korkunç bir kaderi reva görmeye cüret edemem. Bu denli karanlık zamanlarda, imanın ışığına her zamankinden daha çok ihtiyacımız var."
